languages.text: {n}"Теодора" сочувственно цокает языком, протягивает руку и заботливо гладит Идиру по волосам.{/n} "Бедняжка Идира... ну, ну... как я могла не прийти? Ты так отчаянно звала меня, что твой плач донесся до самых глубин {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}..."

traits.locale_text: {n}"Теодора" сочувственно цокает языком, протягивает руку и заботливо гладит Идиру по волосам.{/n} "Бедняжка Идира... ну, ну... как я могла не прийти? Ты так отчаянно звала меня, что твой плач донесся до самых глубин {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}..."
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."
languages.original_text: {n}"Теодора" сочувственно цокает языком, протягивает руку и заботливо гладит Идиру по волосам.{/n} "Бедняжка Идира... ну, ну... как я могла не прийти? Ты так отчаянно звала меня, что твой плач донесся до самых глубин {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпа{/g}..."

languages.text: {n}“西奥多拉”同情地啧着舌，伸出手，温柔地抚摸着伊迪拉的头发。{/n}“可怜的小伊迪拉……好啦，好啦……我怎么可能不来呢？你都为我哭得那么撕心裂肺了，你的哀求甚至传到了{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}深处……”
languages.original_text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}“西奥多拉”同情地啧着舌，伸出手，温柔地抚摸着伊迪拉的头发。{/n}“可怜的小伊迪拉……好啦，好啦……我怎么可能不来呢？你都为我哭得那么撕心裂肺了，你的哀求甚至传到了{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}深处……”
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}«Theodora» chasca la lengua con empatía, extendiendo la mano para acariciar con cariño el pelo de Idira.{/n} «Mi pobre Idira... Vamos, ya pasó... ¿Cómo no iba a venir? Tenías tantas ansias por verme que tus plegarias llegaron a las profundidades de la misma {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}...».
languages.original_text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}«Theodora» chasca la lengua con empatía, extendiendo la mano para acariciar con cariño el pelo de Idira.{/n} «Mi pobre Idira... Vamos, ya pasó... ¿Cómo no iba a venir? Tenías tantas ansias por verme que tus plegarias llegaron a las profundidades de la misma {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}...».
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}『シオドーラ』は同情するかのように喉を鳴らし、イディラの髪を優しく撫でようと手を伸ばす。{/n}「かわいそうなイディラ…ほらほら…私が来るのも当然でしょう？あなたは必死に私を求めて泣いていた、あなたの懇願は{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の奥底まで伝わっていたもの…」
languages.original_text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}『シオドーラ』は同情するかのように喉を鳴らし、イディラの髪を優しく撫でようと手を伸ばす。{/n}「かわいそうなイディラ…ほらほら…私が来るのも当然でしょう？あなたは必死に私を求めて泣いていた、あなたの懇願は{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}の奥底まで伝わっていたもの…」
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}"Theodora" schnalzt freundlich mit ihrer Zunge und streichelt zärtlich über Idiras Haar.{/n} "Arme kleine Idira ... Schon gut ... Wie hätte ich nicht kommen können? Du hast so verzweifelt um mich geweint, deine Bitten waren selbst in den Tiefen des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g} zu hören ..."
languages.original_text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}'Theodora' schnalzt freundlich mit ihrer Zunge und streichelt zärtlich über Idiras Haar.{/n} "Arme kleine Idira ... Schon gut ... Wie hätte ich nicht kommen können? Du hast so verzweifelt um mich geweint, deine Bitten waren selbst in den Tiefen des {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warps{/g} zu hören ..."
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}« Théodora » se fend d'un petit claquement de langue compatissant avant de tendre la main pour caresser tendrement les cheveux d'Idira.{/n} « Pauvre petite Idira... Là, du calme... Comment aurais-je pu faire la sourde oreille avec ces appels désespérés qui résonnaient jusque dans les profondeurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}« Théodora » se fend d'un petit claquement de langue compatissant avant de tendre la main pour caresser tendrement les cheveux d'Idira.{/n} « Pauvre petite Idira... Là, du calme... Comment aurais-je pu faire la sourde oreille avec ces appels désespérés qui résonnaient jusque dans les profondeurs du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ? »
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit

languages.text: {n}"Theodora", sempatiyle cıklayıp İdira'nın saçını nazikçe okşamak için elini uzatıyor.{/n} "Zavallı minik İdira... Geçti, geçti... Dönmemem mümkün müydü? Çaresizce beni çağırıyordun, feryadın {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutun{/g} derinliklerine kadar ulaştı."
languages.original_text: {n}"Theodora" clucks her tongue in sympathy, reaching out to tenderly stroke Idira's hair.{/n} "Poor little Idira... There, there... How could I not come? You were crying for me so desperately, your pleas carried to the very depths of the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} itself..."

traits.locale_text: {n}"Theodora" sempatiyle cıklayıp İdira'nın saçını nazikçe okşamak için elini uzatıyor.{/n} "Zavallı minik İdira... Geçti, geçti... Sana nasıl hayır diyebilirim? Çaresizce beni çağırıyordun, feryadın {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}un derinliklerine kadar ulaştı."
traits.speaker: WarpBeastTheodoraUnit
